errors.name: InsufficientSolForFee
errors.msg: Insufficient SOL for fee - would leave account below rent-exempt minimum

errors.name: InvalidReferrer
errors.msg: Referrer address does not match project referrer

errors.name: InvalidPoolDuration
errors.msg: Invalid pool duration - must be greater than 0

errors.name: AprTooHigh
errors.msg: Calculated APR exceeds maximum u64 value

errors.name: WrongTokenType
errors.msg: Wrong token type - must match project token mint

errors.name: UnauthorizedVault
errors.msg: Unauthorized vault - must belong to this project

errors.name: InvalidStakeAccount
errors.msg: Invalid stake account for specified user

errors.name: InvalidWithdrawalWallet
errors.msg: Invalid withdrawal wallet - does not match stake withdrawal_wallet

errors.name: InvalidReflectionVault
errors.msg: Invalid reflection vault - does not match project reflection vault

errors.name: InvalidProject
errors.msg: Invalid project - stake does not belong to this project

errors.name: InconsistentTotalStaked
errors.msg: Inconsistent total staked - total_staked is less than withdrawal amount

errors.name: PoolEnded
errors.msg: Pool has ended - cannot deposit after pool end time

errors.name: InvalidRateMode
errors.msg: Invalid rate mode - must be 0 (fixed APY) or 1 (variable APR)

errors.name: MissingAssociatedTokenProgram
errors.msg: Missing Associated Token Program - required when reflections are enabled

errors.name: RefreshRequired
errors.msg: Please refresh reflections before claiming - new tokens have arrived in the vault

errors.name: CannotCloseWithActiveStakes
errors.msg: Cannot close project with active stakes - all users must withdraw first
